description.message: Download files with Ant Download Manager (AntDM)

link_was_catched.message: The link was captured by browser extension antFF and sent to AntDM to download

no_links_for_downloading.message: There are no available links for downloading.

cannot_launch_app.message:
Cannot launch AntDM.

If error repeats, please reinstall application.

rate_it.message: If you liked our extension, rate it please

welcome_to_antdm.message: Welcome to Ant Download Manager extension!

extension_already_is_installed.message: The extension antFF2 already is installed!

description_1.message: The extension helps to download any files from the Internet: exe, zip, doc, mp4, avi, mp3, etc...

description_2.message: Supports network HTTP(S), FTP(S) and media stream F4M, M3U8, MPEG-DASH, VIMEO-STREAM protocols.

warning.message: Note: this extension works in cooperation with Ant Download Manager (AntDM) our software. If you want to use this extension, you should download and install AntDM on your computer.
